Buena_Park.Fullerton Fire Department:
The Fullerton Fire Department is the agency that provides fire protection and emergency medical services for Fullerton, California. The department is reposible for an area of approximately 22 square miles (57 km2) that has a population of just over 135,000 as of 2010.


== History ==
The Fullerton Fire Department was formally established as a volunteer department on August 10, 1908.
